                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public Response<Session> getSessionByUsername(java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String password)
        User login (via username) WS end point
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the user
        password - Password in SHA256 salt format
        Returns:
        Success with token returned / fail with error message

      • submitOrder

        @RequestMapping(value="order",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public Response<java.lang.String> submitOrder(int userId,
                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String sessionToken,
                                                                                                                                                                      Order order)
        Submit order WS end point - For user submit the order request after selected the pizza he/she wants to buy
        Parameters:
        id - User id of the user
        token - Session token obtained from login / registration
        order - Order submitted by user, serialized to JAVA POJO for further processing
        Returns:
        Success with order confirmation / fail with error message
